image.altText: A mid shot of Senator Linda Reynolds walking towards the camera outside court, dressed in black with spectacles and a bag.

props.synopsis: Brittany Higgins and her husband's true colours are on display in a series of text messages that mocked Senator Linda Reynolds after she was hospitalised with heart concerns, a WA court hears.

title.children: Linda Reynolds seeks more than $500k in Brittany Higgins defamation payout, court hears

image.altText: Senator Linda Reynolds speaks to a scrum of reporters.

props.synopsis: The Linda Reynolds-Brittany Higgins defamation trial is all over bar the outcome. As Justice Paul Tottle retires to consider his verdict, we take a look back at the trial's five biggest moments.

title.children: The five biggest moments in the high-stakes defamation battle between Linda Reynolds and Brittany Higgins

image.altText: The words ‘No Change To WA GST’ have been scrawled on a reporter's arm and signed by Anthony Albanese.

props.synopsis: The GST deal has been described as "the worst public policy decision in Australia so far this century" but none of the major parties will touch it for fear of upsetting Western Australia.

title.children: The major parties are stuck in a $53b GST trap — because no-one dares anger the Vengeful Deity of the West

image.altText: A mid-shot of accused rapist Farzam Mehrabi walking in front of a construction fence, wearing a suit and tie and white shirt.

props.synopsis: Farzam Mehrabi was captured on CCTV in bars, putting drugs into the drinks of women he was dating.

title.children: Perth dentist found guilty of drugging, raping women he met through dating apps

image.altText: Firewood pile

props.synopsis: A warmer than average winter and cost-of-living challenges are hitting consumers, but the WA's biggest firewood businesses say illegal sales and harvesting are a massive problem.

title.children: Firewood suppliers point finger at online 'black market' amid record supply glut

image.altText: Carnarvon fascine

props.synopsis: A multi-billion-dollar green hydrogen project tipped to transform the coastal town of Carnarvon into a clean energy hub is shelved, prompting questions about the viability of other projects in WA.

title.children: Another green energy project has hit the wall in WA — so where to from here?

image.altText: Alex Saffy in action during the 100m butterfly S10

props.synopsis: Alex Saffy, who has cerebral palsy, broke an Oceanic record with a 56.61-second finish in the men's 100m butterfly S10.

title.children: 'Bunbury Bullet' Alex Saffy celebrates emotional Paralympic swimming bronze

image.altText: Derby Taxis vehicle parked at the Derby jetty at sunset

props.synopsis: There's just one wheelchair accessible taxi for more than 35,000 people living in the Kimberley region which advocates say is isolating residents and tourists in towns such as Broome and Kununurra.

title.children: There's just one wheelchair taxi in far northern WA. Residents say that needs to change

image.altText: Ben O'Connor grimaces on the bike

props.synopsis: Ben O'Connor holds onto the red leader jersey at the Vuelta a España by just 5 seconds, but is left furious — and freezing — after a miscommunication at the finish line.

title.children: Podium confusion leaves WA cyclist O'Connor 'pissed' after 'heroic' ride to retain red jersey

image.altText: The silhouette of a steel lattice gas tower at dusk with a flare at the top

props.synopsis: Australia is one of the world's biggest gas exporters, but we're about to start importing it from overseas.

title.children: 'We've run out of time': The imperfect solution to an energy crisis Australia should've avoided

image.altText: A composite image showing photos taken from CCTV vision.

props.synopsis: Explicit and uncensored CCTV vision of people having sex in a lift and urinating in public was turned into a video and played to hundreds of staff at a Merivale awards night.

title.children: CCTV video of people having sex at Merivale venue played at hospitality group's staff party

image.altText: A man in a black shirt and pants sits on a stage next to actors.

props.synopsis: An ABC investigation uncovers allegations from young men against an influential Tasmanian theatre production manager that he made unwanted sexual advances, including through physical contact at after-parties and by sexting a school student.

title.children: Former Launceston mayor Danny Gibson accused of unwanted sexual advances, sexting theatre student

image.altText: A green RT logo on a phone screen in front of a white, red and black YouTube logo

props.synopsis: Two employees at Russia's RT, a state-run media company, are accused of money laundering by commissioning a US company to produce videos swaying voters in the upcoming presidential election.

title.children: US accuses Russian state media of attempting to influence 2024 election

image.altText: A composite image including a motorcycle, a man's silhouetted upper body, palm trees, methamphetamines and drug parcels.

props.synopsis: Former drug traffickers have revealed how they manipulated often under-resourced border controls and isolated ports and airports, to bring drugs into the Pacific.

title.children: Drug traffickers reveal 'easy' methods to import product into the Pacific, 'paying off' customs and airport staff

image.altText: Two people walking by a street with one wrapping a pride flag around them

props.synopsis: Multiple major health bodies, including the Australian Human Rights Institute, are calling on the federal government to include questions on gender and sexual orientation in the next census.

title.children: Scrapping LGBTI+ census questions leaves 'invisible' populations at risk of harm, say leading health bodies

image.altText: Close-up of electronic gaming machine screen.

props.synopsis: Australia has the highest gambling losses in the world, according to a new Grattan Institute report that calls on federal and state governments to stand up to "vested Interests" and implement a complete ban on gambling ads and limits on how much people can bet when at the pokies and via online betting platforms.

title.children: As the gambling ad ban debate heats up, there are calls for maximum loss limits for pokies and online betting

image.altText: A close up image of a man in a tie.

props.synopsis: Apart from the pandemic years, GDP hasn't been this weak since Jim Chalmers was at school and Oasis was getting together for the first time.

title.children: GDP has plunged and consumers are hurting. Without government spending things could be worse

image.altText: An overhead view of a busy mall filled with shoppers.

props.synopsis: The federal government lays out its plans to set "mandatory guardrails" for the highest-risk AI tools, as a survey of businesses reveals a third of those using AI are not disclosing it to customers or staff.

title.children: A third of businesses using AI without telling customers or employees

image.altText: Alexa Leary of Australia celebrates on the podium, pumping her fists with a gold medal around her neck

props.synopsis: Australian para swimmer Alexa Leary is the Paralympic champion in the women's 100m freestyle S9 with a new world record. Follow live.

title.children: Alexa Leary wins gold and breaks the world record for the second time in one day

image.altText: Muhannad's wife Razan (left) his daughter Millar (middle) being held by her dad Muhannad. There is rubble behind them.

props.synopsis: Muhannad and his family in Gaza had their temporary visas to Australia rejected in January. Thousands of other applicants in Gaza are in the same situation, prompting renewed calls for the government to make humanitarian visa pathways an option.

title.children: Visitor visa rejections pile up for Palestinians in Gaza as calls for humanitarian visas spark debate

image.altText: Mike Burgess wearing a suit standing in front of a staircase.

props.synopsis: ASIO boss Mike Burgess says he may soon use powers to compel tech companies to cooperate with warrants and unlock encrypted chats to aid in national security investigations.

title.children: ASIO boss puts tech companies on notice regarding encrypted chats

image.altText: Alex de Minaur reaching for a tennis ball with his racquet

props.synopsis: Alex de Minaur has lost to Great Britain's Jack Draper in straight sets at the US Open, in an uncharacteristic performance from the Australian.

title.children: Alex de Minaur knocked out of US Open quarterfinals in straight sets

image.altText: 0.5x zoom image of Kure Medical Mildura sign on front of medical clinic, with a black vignette

props.synopsis: The practice of charging patients an annual membership fee to guarantee bulk-billed services is being described as a "rampant" form of breaching Medicare rules.

title.children: GP clinics accused of breaching Medicare rules by charging patients to access bulk-billing

image.altText: Several police cars blocking a road on a semi-rural lane.

props.synopsis: A 14-year-old student has been charged with murder after four people were shot dead at a high school near Atlanta, Georgia.

title.children: 'An evil thing': 14-year-old charged with murder after four killed in US school shooting

image.altText: A family of three sitting in a loungeroom looking at the camera. The young son is holding a black chicken

props.synopsis: Contentious legislation paving the way for a shake-up of the NDIS recently passed parliament. But about a month out from changes starting to take effect, many participants remain in the dark about what it means for them.

title.children: Major NDIS changes are weeks away. Felicity's worried about what it means for her kids

image.altText: A composite image of two men: Donald Trump and Anthony Scaramucci.

props.synopsis: Anthony Scaramucci did not last long in the Trump administration but he is certain of one thing: four more years of Trump could have potentially disastrous consequences for the United States and the world.

title.children: 'Malevolence, cruelty': Scaramucci issues warning on what four more years of Trump means

props.synopsis: Many parents suffer silently from lack of sleep, sometimes with devastating outcomes. Why is there so much conflicting information on baby sleep, and how can we support families to thrive?

title.children: 'I was an absolute train wreck': How to navigate the secrets of baby sleep with science

image.altText: Building covered in scaffolding, construction, crane

props.synopsis: The federal government proposal is stranded in the Senate after the Coalition and the Greens both declared it would "do nothing" about housing affordability.

title.children: Labor's tax break for housing investors hits Senate snag

image.altText: A serious-looking bald man in a suit and glasses stands in front of a sombre-looking background.

props.synopsis: Kim Williams uses his speech to insist all journalists need to earn the trust of their audiences, or risk being consigned to history.

title.children: ABC chair quotes JD Vance as he warns of diminishing trust in media

image.altText: A person wheels their trolley past the end of a supermarket aisle. They are blurred from the motion and are not identifiable.

props.synopsis: New data shows households have been spending more in most categories, with the biggest increases coming in health care, food and services such as maintenance.

title.children: Australian household spending driven by bills to cover the necessities

image.altText: A girl dancing with two DJs in the background on a black and white montage

props.synopsis: As goliaths of the Australian music festival scene fall, you could be forgiven for thinking young people have lost their appetite for live music. In truth, a new dance scene has emerged.

title.children: As the music festival scene cools down, Australia's boiler room parties are getting hotter than ever

image.altText: Woman with blonde wavy hair smiles at cameras

props.synopsis: Elle Macpherson has shared her life lessons in a new memoir, but revelations about her breast cancer treatment have come under fire from experts.

title.children: 'Incredibly irresponsible': Doctor slams Elle Macpherson's breast cancer treatment decision
